class.name: com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Subject
class.query: select sa from com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Subject s join s.accessList sa where s.id = :subjectId and sa.resource = :resource and sa.operation in (:operations)

select sa from com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Subject s join s.accessList sa left join sa.site site where s.id = :subjectId and sa.resource = :resource and sa.operation in (:operations) and (site.id is null or site.name in (:sites))

select sa from com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Subject s join s.accessList sa left join sa.collectionProtocol cp where s.id = :subjectId and sa.resource = :resource and (cp.id is null or cp.id = :cpId) and sa.operation in (:operations)
select count(sa) from com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Subject s join s.accessList sa where s.id = :subjectId and sa.resource = :resource and sa.operation in (:operations)
delete from com.krishagni.rbac.domain.SubjectRole role where role.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId
class.sql-query: select subject_id as subjectId from rbac_subject_access_view where subject_id = :subjectId and resource_name = :resource and operation = :operation and (cp_id = :cpId or cp_id is null)

select subject_id as subjectId from rbac_subject_access_view where subject_id = :subjectId and resource_name = :resource and operation = :operation and (cp_id = :cpId or cp_id is null) and (site_id in (:siteIds) or site_id is null)
select cp_id as cpId, site_id as siteId from rbac_subject_access_view where resource_name = :resource and operation = :operation and subject_id = :userId

select distinct s.identifier as subjectId from catissue_user s inner join rbac_subject_access_view sa on sa.subject_id = s.identifier inner join catissue_institution userInst on userInst.identifier = s.institute_id inner join ( select site.identifier as siteId, site.institute_id as instituteId from catissue_collection_protocol cp inner join catissue_site_cp cpSite on cpSite.collection_protocol_id = cp.identifier inner join catissue_site site on site.identifier = cpSite.site_id where cp.identifier = :cpId and cp.activity_status != 'Disabled' and site.activity_status != 'Disabled' ) cpSiteInst on cpSiteInst.instituteId = userInst.identifier where sa.resource_name = :resource and sa.operation in (:operations) and (sa.cp_id is null or sa.cp_id = :cpId) and (sa.site_id is null or sa.site_id = cpSiteInst.siteId) and s.activity_status != 'Disabled'
